page.title: 09Hedgerow Project
page.content: {Date started:}16/6/85. {County:}Buckinghamshire. {Grid Reference:}05 Sheet 165 1:50000 G.R. 956 998. {Age of hedge:}About 1000 years old. {Number of trees and shrubs {present in a 30 metre strip:- {Trees and shrubs present:}10. {Shrubs:}Ivy, Laurel, Rose. {Trees:}Hawthorn, Holly, Sloe, Hazel, Beech, Field Maple. {Flowering plants present:}Grass, Greater Stichwort, Ivy, Nettle, Blue-bells, Thistle, Buttercup. {Animals found in hedge:}Woodlice, slugs, spiders, mites, ladybirds, ants, millipedes, centipedes, beetles, voles, field mice, shrews. {Birds seen in hedge:}Dumnock, magpie, blue-tit, great-tit. {Type of hedge:}Mixed hedge, unmanaged. {Type of soil:}chalky soil {Ph:} 6.5
